reviewText:
My thanks for the prompt delivery of this product.
This movie was originally bought as VHS tape for my son many years ago and he recently passed it on to his son. Unfortunately soon after this tape eventually failed so I started looking for a another copy. It arrived intime for his birthday. They both were so surprised I sourced a DVD copy.
They both sit back together and enjoy this old movie.

Robert.
this product was in excellent shape and doing buisness with the person was great no problems
This was a copy, a cheap one at that, it wouldn't play and was VERY expensive. Do NOT purchase from this seller!
Kids love it!  Especially boys!  They all want to be the Dirt Bike Kid!

It was a cute movie. Definately not the best, but not the worst either. I remember loving it as a kid and loved the idea of a dirtbike that has a mind of it's own. My nephews may like it so I'm going to check it out and buy it for them. :)
I saw this movie in the theatre when I was 12.  I'm now 30.  I still remember it as the worst movie I ever saw.  Ever.  (Raising Cain is #2 and Van Helsing is #3.)
Bought for a friend and he loves it.
Ok not the best
CLASSIC MOVIE.
Great movie. Takes me back to when I was a kid, now I'm showing it to my son. Which he talks about a magic dirt bike all the time now.
Took me back to child hood
defective
Grandson loved it
Loved this movie as a kid and now my kids enjoy it as well
awesome
Excellency !
Super fast. Perfect. Thanks!
Definitely brought back childhood memories. I wasn't able to find this movie anywhere else.
Good movie
Love the movie! Shipping was fast !!
Love this i rem watching this a long time ago on disney channel with my brother. Prob 25 years or more ago. Great deal fast shipping. 5 days it was here.  Thanks.
My Son loved this movie as a kid. Now my Grandson can enjoy it to!  Love it! Just wish we could get it in DVD:(
Good Stuff!!!!
kids are happy
Great film of my childhood
This is such a blast from the past. My husband loves it so much! Great quality disc.
It's Peter Billingsley,(A Christmas Story) .I wore this movie out at Hollywood Video back in the day ,now I can wear out this Blu ray:). And I can finally avoid all the bootleg copies.
Good buy
Was a favorite for my sons 25 years ago,  bought for grandson and he and his father have watched together
Kids loved it
Love this Movie! No bad language and just a fun one for kids.
Loved watching a childhood movie
Watched this movie as a kid and loved it.  My four year old now loves it!
great
My 4 year old nephew loved this movie! Ty!
My husband's favorite movie from growing up.  He was thrilled to find it on DVD and add to his collection!

I love this movie, one of my favorites growing up. I have a copy on VHS from Hollywood video when they sold it off. This is the best quality version I have ever seen!!! Unfortunately they cropped the full 35 mill down for 16x9 and you loose a lot of the top and bottom of the screen that was intended to be seen!!. :(
 I have compared it to my VHS to make sure and its cut off. on top and bottom from the original version.
Great movie
A must have if your a child of the 80s
My 27 year old son was very happy

Just like I remembered as a kid!  The quality was great and the cover art was perfect.  I don't have anything bad to say about the quality of the movie.  The acting wasn't as good as I remember but then again that was back in the 80's.
I'm glad this finally came to bluray. Looks way better than vhs very good hd transfer.
Perfect!
Great movie reminds me of my childhood growing up we all loved the film thanks Amazon
high quality merchandise and fun to watch.  delivered on time and as described.
love this flick!
Another great flick from when I was a kid, glad it finally was put in dvd, and blu ray? Great!
Surprisingly looks good on my 50" LCD TV.  Giving the age of the film, it looks and sounds good with that classic touch.  Still letterbox format.
was so glad to find this movie that my son love to watch when he was a kid... He was happy when gave it to him..and it arrived quickly..
Great product
Looks Great On Blu-Ray. I Had Been Looking For A Copy Of This Movie For Years. But Could Never Find It Except On VHS. So I Am Very Happy To See It In High Definition Blu-Ray. Thanks A Lot.

While this movie was not a big kid's film (low budget) and came out without a lot of fanfare when it hit theaters, I worked on the film AND my son was the "scorekeeper".  So, what am I gonna to say?  I have waited for this film to come out on DVD and it went straight to Blu-Ray.  I have a dusty copy of the original video which my son had a hard time finding.  It was fun to see again.
I've been looking for this movie for years. It wasn't available for the longest time. Decent quality. Brings back memories from when I was a kid
Looking for a long time glad I found it thank you.
BACK IN NEW YORK A LONG TIME AGO I'VE SEEN THAT MOVIE AT PREMM LEARNING CENTER FOR MY 10TH BIRTHDAY IN SUMMER SCHOOL 1991.
What I expected
I HAD A LITTLE PART IN THIS MOVIE SO I BOUGHT IT FOR MY KIDS
Childhood favorite I never thought I'd see again.

Never thought I would see this movie come to DVD, let alone Blu-Ray. The Limited Edition Blu Ray is a must have for any Dirt Bike Kid fan from the 80's. The quality of the conversion is very nice. It's definately not High Definition Blu Ray quality, but it is very clear compared to the VHS version. I would say it's definately DVD quality anyway. The Blu Ray has a menu, with an Audio Commentary from the director, also a couple of interviews. This far surpasses the bootleg copy that was sold in years past as the DVD. This is an actual Blu-Ray disc or DVD release.
The box was in good shape but, I ordered the wrong item. It's not what I wanted.  I wanted a different movie.
Awesome movie.  I hadn't watched it in at leat 25 years.  After watching it, I fell in love with it all over again.  My 4 year old son loves it too.  He watched it at least 10 times in a row.

This DVD can be purchased from vintageshack for $15.99 I bought one on ebay for $20, the quality was poor, it was like a worn out VHS quality on DVD. I could tell it is not an official dvd release that was ever in stores. In fact a VHS copy of this movie may have better picture quality then the DVD, at least the VHS is official. The DVD is a laserdisc transfer. The one for sale on Amazon at $200 may be official since it is sealed, my ebay copy came like new however it was the exact same artwork.
This was purchased as a gift. It was one of those hard to find, always at the tip of your tongue movies.
Yes old school movie still just as good then as now kids loved it its a good family movie for the young kids 5 an older will love it

Even after so many years this movie still has a place in my heart never forgotten I've been looking everywhere for it for a longtime I'm so happy I finally have the chance to own this great movie a must see always 2 thumbs up great movie
Poor quality video, but it's out of print, and rare now.  You get what you get I guess.  This almost appears to be copied from VHS format.  This was for my grandson, and he likes it anyway.
Came on time ! Great movie
Love it.  My kids love it as much as I did back in the day.
Best surprise for an adult who grew up in the 80s. Great family movie. Our kids loved it as well. It's now a frequently watched movie just like when I was a kid. Delivery was on time.
Classic
awesome
My kids favorite!
This was a gift for my grandson. No problems with the dvd.
Happy to find this!!!
Great movie from my childhood.
Great movie..love those 80s movies
